greetingInfo: Hello! I'm an experienced Product Designer and Emerging Technology Consultant with over a decade of expertise in transforming B2C, B2B, and startup sectors. In partnership with C-suite leadership, I've led the successful launch of various digital platforms, achieving measurable results and stimulating business growth. As part of agile teams, I blend innovation, organizational culture, and design to produce meaningful outcomes. Additionally, I champion and advocate for exceptional user experiences with an outcome-focused approach.

greetingInfoSub.text: I'm writing a book on UX design, coming soon.
